extDescription.message: Stylish for Opera支持对不同地址自定义样式。

labelNewStyle.description: Default name of a new style.

msgConfirm.description: Message shown before installing a style.

msgUpdated.description: Message shown when a style is updated/reinstalled.

msgErrorParsing.description: Message shown when CSS code is invalid.

msgErrorFetchingStyle.description: Message shown when Stylish fails fetching a new version of the style.

msgInstalled.description: Message shown when a style is installed.

msgUpdating.description: Message shown when a new version of style is being fetched.

msgNewVersion.description: Message shown when a new version of style is found by metaUrl, but no updateUrl is provided.

msgCheckingForUpdate.description: Message shown when a style is being checked for updates.

msgErrorFetchingUpdateInfo.description: Message shown when Stylish fails fetching version data of the style.

msgNoUpdate.description: Message shown when there is no new version of a style.

labelNoName.description: Text as the name of a style when name is empty.

menuManageStyles.description: Menu item to manage styles, or to open the options page of the extension.

menuFindStyles.description: Menu item to find styles for a site.

menuStylesEnabled.description: Menu item showing the status of Stylish, whether enabled.

menuBack.description: Menu item to go back to main menu from alternate stylesheets.

menuAlterStylesheet.description: Menu item to show alternate stylesheets of the current page.

buttonNew.description: Button to create a new style.

buttonAdvanced.description: Button to show the advanced options.

labelInstalledStyles.description: Label of the list of installed styles.

anchorSupportPage.description: Link to the support page of Stylish.

anchorAuthor.description: Author shown in the footer of options page, translator information may be added.

labelStyleEditor.description: Shown in the title of the style editing page.

Remove prefixes while applying:.message: 应用样式时自动移除前缀：

buttonSave.description: Button to save modifications of a style.

buttonSaveClose.description: Button to save modifications of a style and then close the editing page.

labelExport.description: Label shown in the title of export dialog.

labelFirefoxCSS.description: Option to export data as Firefox CSS files.

hintFirefoxCSS.message: (?)

buttonAllNone.description: Button to select all styles or none.

labelAdvanced.description: Label shown in the title of advanced dialog.

labelShowButton.description: Option to show an icon of this extension in the toolbar.

buttonExportData.description: Button to open the data export dialog.

buttonImportData.description: Button to choose a file for data import.

labelLastUpdated.description: Label of last updated timestamp of a style.

confirmNotSaved.message:
修改尚未保存！
点击确定放弃修改或点击取消停留此页面。
confirmNotSaved.description: Confirm message shown when there are unsaved style modifications.

msgImported.description: Message shown after import. There is an argument referring to the count of styles imported.

msgErrorZip.description: Message shown when Stylish fails to open the zip file.

buttonExporting.description: Message shown when data export is in progress.

msgRename.description: Message shown when a section is going to be renamed.
